text: The 2009–10 Liga IV Teleorman was the 42nd season of the Liga IV Teleorman, the fourth tier of the Romanian football league system. The season began on 29 August 2009 and ended on 5 June 2010. == Team changes == ===To Liga IV Teleorman=== Relegated from Liga III * — Promoted from Liga V Teleorman * Beirut Siliștea * Tineretul Crevenicu * Atletic Orbeasca * Petrolul Videle II ===From Liga IV Teleorman=== Promoted to Liga III * Alexandria Relegated to Liga V Teleorman * Foraj Videle * Șoimii Scrioaștea * Mara Alexandria ==League table== ==Promotion play-off== Champions of Liga IV – Teleorman County face champions of Liga IV – Dolj County. |- |colspan=3 style="background- color:D6D4D3;"|15 June 2010, Stadionul Comunal, Ștefănești. Dunărea Turris Turnu Măgurele promoted to 2010–11 Liga III. ==See also== ===Main Leagues=== * 2009–10 Liga I * 2009–10 Liga II * 2009–10 Liga III ===County Leagues (Liga IV series)=== * 2009–10 Liga IV Alba * 2009–10 Liga IV Bacău * 2009–10 Liga IV Prahova * 2009–10 Liga IV Suceava ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Sport in Teleorman County
title: 2009–10 Liga IV Teleorman
